thread.section_title: Transcat Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Transcat | www.transcat.com
thread.title: Stanley Perkins

author: Stanley Perkins
title: Stanley Perkins
text: I was looking for the best price and fastest delivery on a just-released instrument. TransCat popped up at the top of my search list and I'm glad it did! Not only did they have fast delivery, but their pricing was by far the best. The ordering process was quick and painless, follow-up calls to customer service were quickly answered and very courteous, and my order arrived on-time and complete. I couldn't be happier!
